question: Which Union Ministry of India has launched a portal for Land management system (LMS), for the first time?
option1: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
option3: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
Union Defence Minister Rajnath Singh has recently launched a portal for defence land management system (LMS), to bring transparency and speed in dealing with land management matters.
This is the first time an LMS is developed by the Department of Defence along with the Directorate General Defence Estates (DGDE) and Armed forces. The technical support for this GIS-based system has been provided by Bhaskaracharya Institute for Space Applications and Geoinformatics.
